post.title: Suggestions on Digital Audio Programming
post.content: Anybody have any suggestions of book and/or sites with information about programming with digital audio? I primarily care about mixing and fading, but also some effects and changing the playback speed without effecting the pitch. Feel free to leave comments or email me.
